hideItem(InventoryItem) - Method in class eu.clementime.rds.Inventory
Hides big item after a combination of 2 other items.
hidePointer() - Method in class eu.clementime.rds.GameTools
When it isn't needed anymore, hides pointer and stops its animation.
hideShowAnimation(int) - Method in class eu.clementime.rds.Background
Animation can appear or disappear, depending on the scenario.
hideShowItem(Scene, ScreenItem) - Method in class eu.clementime.rds.Background
When an item is taken by the doll, it disappears of the screen; when two items are combined, another can appear on the screen.
hideShowItemById(int, Scene) - Method in class eu.clementime.rds.Background
When an item is taken by the doll, it disappears of the screen; when two items are combined, another can appear on the screen.
hideZoomView(InventoryItem, Scene) - Method in class eu.clementime.rds.Inventory
Hides zoom and zoom item when player clicks zoom frame; set item position out of screen for avoiding activation when player touches it (AndEngine allows touching invisible sprite).
